description: Number of 5-leaf rooted trees with n levels.
references: B. A. Huberman and T. Hogg, Complexity and adaptation. Evolution, games and learning (Los Alamos, N.M., 1985). Phys. D 22 (1986), no. 1-3, 376-384.
